external_references.source_name: Zscaler PAKLOG CorkLog SplatCloak Splatdropper April 2025
external_references.description: Sudeep Singh. (2025, April 16). Latest Mustang Panda Arsenal: PAKLOG, CorKLOG, and SplatCloak | P2. Retrieved September 12, 2025.

objects.description: [SplatCloak](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1234) has used a revoked certificate to exploit Windows driver execution policy where certificates issued before a specific date could still load.(Citation: Zscaler PAKLOG CorkLog SplatCloak Splatdropper April 2025)
